sourcesContent: import _slicedToArray from"@babel/runtime/helpers/slicedToArray";import BaseFilters from"./BaseFilters";var SEPIA_CONST=.1,COLOR_FILTER_CONST=[255,145,0,.2];function Toaster(a){for(var b=a.data,c=b.length,d=0;d<c;d+=4){var e=BaseFilters.sepia([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],SEPIA_CONST),f=_slicedToArray(e,3);b[d]=f[0],b[d+1]=f[1],b[d+2]=f[2];var g=BaseFilters.colorFilter([b[d],b[d+1],b[d+2]],COLOR_FILTER_CONST),h=_slicedToArray(g,3);b[d]=h[0],b[d+1]=h[1],b[d+2]=h[2]}}Toaster.filterName="Toaster";export default Toaster;
